trans-unit.source: Represents the data contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
The element associated with this automation peer.
The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> class.

Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> enumeration value.

Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Se uma das seguintes situações ocorrer, esse método retorna um objeto que suporta o padrão de controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> possui objetos filho.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> does not have child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> não tem objetos filho.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> tem sua propriedade selecionável definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> can be resized.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is not enabled.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is virtualized.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> does not contain any items.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is not available.

Displays all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> does not contain any items.
-or-

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.target: O estado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> que é associada a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

The checked state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
